synopsis.text: To achieve stardom for her beloved idols, Suuko, a reclusive idol enthusiast, wields her unique power: the ability to skyrocket any idol's popularity through captivating blog posts. When she stumbles upon a live performance by the Fukuoka-based idol group Itorio, she becomes determined to propel them to fame. However, her mission is challenged by the charismatic blogger Ryuu-san, who advocates for the underground idol Mariko, and a fierce competition ensues in the world of idol fandom.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
